TestDescription.name: CKEditor 4.0.1 cross-site scripting vulnerability
TestDescription.Description: The sample file [dark][bold]samples/sample_posteddata.php[/dark][/bold] (distributed with CKEditor 4.0.1) is vulnerable to a Cross-Site Scripting Vulnerability.
TestDescription.Impact: Malicious users may inject JavaScript, VBScript, ActiveX, HTML or Flash into a vulnerable application to fool a user in order to gather data from them. An attacker can steal the session cookie and take over the account, impersonating the user. It is also possible to modify the content of the page presented to the user.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade to the latest version of CKEditor or remove the sample_posteddata.php file.
